comments:
Build id: I20050808-2000

go to windows->preferences->general->Keys (experimental)
select the "Show All Commands" check box.
Note the table stop drawing, probably the code call Table.setRedraw(false),
something bad happens, the code returns and never call Table.setRedraw(true) to
turn redraw back on.
tested on gtk and motif.
